name: Black Radio X Unknown Union Collab Tee (LTD. ED.)

product-description.name: Product Description
product-description.value: Unknown Union collaborates with Robert Glasper to create this limited edition, heavyweight cotton t-shirt. The tee has a relaxed fit, raw edge vintage look, and features NFC technology. Simply tap your phone to the tag to connect, learn, share, and stay updated on exclusive content and events.

featured_event.title: Unlock the Experience

  • Reactive Dye + Enzyme Wash + Softener for a super soft vintage feel

events.title: Robtober Season 6
events.description:
Blue Note New York is proud to announce Robtober Season 6

Legendary 5-time Grammy Award winning pianist, producer, and songwriter Robert Glasper! Running October 2-Nov 3, this iconic 5 week residency will feature many amazing artists and very special guests.


Check it out.
events.address: New York City, New York, United States

events.title: Artist Spotlight
events.description:
Robert Glasper, a jazz pianist from Houston, Texas, is renowned for his innovative blend of jazz, hip-hop, R&B, and rock. Influenced by his gospel pianist mother, Glasper honed his skills at Houston's High School for the Performing Arts and the New School University in Manhattan. His versatile career includes collaborations with Christian McBride, Kenny Garrett, Roy Hargrove, and Mos Def. Glasper's debut album Mood was released in 2004, followed by Canvas and In My Element. His groundbreaking album Black Radio with the Robert Glasper Experiment won a Grammy for Best R&B Album and blurred genre boundaries. He continued to innovate with Black Radio 2, winning another Grammy, and has contributed to significant projects like Kendrick Lamar’s To Pimp a Butterfly and the Miles Davis tribute album Everything’s Beautiful.

Click here to learn more about Robert Glasper.
